Class Budget

java.lang.Object
Budget
public class Budget extends Object
The Budget class represents a user's financial data for a single calendar year. It stores income and expense transactions, allows modification of these records, and provides analytical summaries such as monthly totals and annual performance. This class is part of the Storage module responsible for maintaining budget objects between program sessions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Budget()
    Constructs a new Budget object for the current year.

  • Constructor Details

    • Budget

      public Budget()
      Constructs a new Budget object for the current year. Initializes the internal data structure for tracking transactions.

  • Method Details

    • addTransaction

      public void addTransaction(String date, String category, double amount)
      Adds a new transaction to the user's budget for the year.
      Parameters:
      date - the date of the transaction in MM/DD/YYYY format
      category - the category of the transaction (e.g., Food, Utilities, Compensation)
      amount - the dollar amount of the transaction (positive for income, negative for expense)

    • removeTransaction

      public void removeTransaction(int transactionIndex)
      Removes a transaction from the user's budget based on its index.
      Parameters:
      transactionIndex - the 0-based index number of the transaction to remove

    • updateTransaction

      public void updateTransaction(int transactionIndex, String newDate, String newCategory, double newAmount)
      Updates an existing transaction with new information based on its index.
      Parameters:
      transactionIndex - the 0-based index number of the transaction to update
      newDate - the updated date of the transaction in MM/DD/YYYY format
      newCategory - the updated category of the transaction
      newAmount - the updated amount of the transaction

    • getTransactionsByMonth

      public ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactionsByMonth()
      Retrieves all transactions, potentially sorted or grouped by month.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Transaction objects sorted or grouped by month

    • getTransactionsByCategory

      public ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactionsByCategory()
      Retrieves all transactions, potentially sorted or grouped by category.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Transaction objects sorted or grouped by category

    • calculateMonthlyTotals

      public ArrayList<Double> calculateMonthlyTotals()
      Calculates the total income and expenses (net total) for each month in the year.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of 12 Double values representing the monthly net totals

    • calculateAnnualSummary

      public ArrayList<Double> calculateAnnualSummary()
      Generates a summary of the user's annual financial performance. This includes total income, total expenses, and overall net balance.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing summary values for total income, total expenses, and overall net balance
